TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Ride, title = Ride, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ride} }

S.FORM: Ride i Pingtung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Ride. u kasalumaluma' nu Ride sa, 167 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 420 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 153 ku tademaw, pakalatu 36%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 267 ku tademaw, pakalatu 64%. u kasabinacadan, Paiwan 35%, Amis 1%.

Ride i Pingtong a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Ride. o kasalomaloma' no Ride sa, 167 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 420 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 153 ko tademaw, pakalato 36%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 267 ko tademaw, pakalato 64%. o kasabinacadan, Paiwan 35%, Amis 1%.
